What to Check For

Verify that PHP is configured to make sessions time-out, regardless of user activity.

Why

Limiting session life-time makes it harder to hijack sessions.

How to Check

To verify that PHP is configured to make sessions time-out, view the php.ini file and make sure the "session.cookie_lifetime" settings has the value that matches the required session time limit.

How to Fix

To set an absolute session time limit, configure the php.ini file to include the following directive:

session.cookie_lifetime = 60000

The snippet above sets the maximum session life-time to 60000 seconds by limiting the life-time of the session cookies.
